title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), when opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled. However, I noticed that when I try to move them around, they don't have any effect. Additionally, when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Ensure you have Build F2 (20020602), Redhat 7.2, and GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only) installed. 2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around but have no effect. 4. Open a small image, like an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading as they do not do anything.
